# AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.unbounded

**Case**

Continue to add to the buffer, treating its capacity as infinite.

## Declaration

```swift
case unbounded
```

## Buffering Policies

- **AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingOldest(_:)**: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.
- **AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingNewest(_:)**: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.

items.description: When the buffer is full, discard the newly received element.
items.name: AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingOldest(_:)

items.description: When the buffer is full, discard the oldest element in the buffer.
items.name: AsyncThrowingStream.Continuation.BufferingPolicy.bufferingNewest(_:)
